name: Kokatat Gore-Tex Odyssey Dry Suit - Women's
description: Guaranteed to keep you dry on your next big water adventure. The Odyssey drysuit is made of GORE-TEX® Pro fabric in the body and durable 330-cordura GORE-TEX Pro in the pants, knees and seat. A removable hood allows you to stay cool on warm days, and protected from the elements when the weather turns. Thanks to pockets on each arm and on the right thigh helps, you can stay organized without having to reach under your PFD to get to your storage.Front-entry drysuit is easy to zip up on your own.GORE-TEX Pro in the body and socks.Cordura GORE-TEX Pro-reinforced pant, seat and knee patches for increased durability.Dual-adjustable over-skirt with hook-and-loop compatible neoprene.Removable suspenders keeps your drysuit from pulling down.Adjustable bungee drawcord at waist keeps it close to your body.Left and right sleeve pockets and 1 right thigh pocket.Latex neck and wrist gaskets.Nylon waterproof front-entry zipper.Drop seat is handy for bathroom breaks.Removable hood.Reflective tape for visibility.Every suit 100% fill tested; guaranteed to be dry.
